comparison.description: Determines how the slipperiness value of the block is compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the slipperiness value of the block is compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the slipperiness value of the block to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the slipperiness value of the block to.

type.description:
## Slipperiness

---



[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/slipperiness)

Checks the slipperiness value of the block.

Type ID: `origins:slipperiness`




---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:slipperiness",
    "comparison": "==",
    "compare_to": 0.98
}
```

This example will check if the block has the same slipperiness of an Ice (or Packed Ice) block.
